tagline: Frontiers in AI, Data, and Engineering Systems

pi.name: Ayesha SIddiqua Dina
pi.bio: PI of FP University Research Lab. Research in AI for systems, PLM knowledge graphs, and scientific ML.

projects.title: FSProtoTransfer: Synergizing Few-Shot, Prototypical Networks, and Transfer Learning for Intrusion Detection in VANETs
projects.summary: Combines few-shot learning, prototypical networks, and transfer learning for robust intrusion detection in VANETs.

projects.title: Large Language Models for Automated Characterization of Cybersecurity Vulnerabilities using N-Shot Learning
projects.summary: Applies LLMs with N-shot prompting to classify and characterize cybersecurity vulnerabilities.
